text: The Half Sisters is a Philippine television drama series. It is broadcast by GMA Network. == Cast == * Barbie Forteza as Diana Mercado Valdica単as * Thea Tolentino as Ashley Mercado Alcantara * Derrick Monasterio as Sebastian 'Baste' David * Andre Paras as Bradley 'Brad' Castillo * Jean Garcia as Karina 'Rina' Mercado / Alexa Robbins * Jomari Yllana as Benjamin 'Benjie' Valdica単as / Mang Tonyo and Noli de Santos * Ryan Eigenmann as Alfred Alcantara * Eula Valdez as Isabel dela Rhea / Ysabela Zu単iga-Valdica単as == References == ==Other websites== *Official website Category:2014 Philippine television series debuts Category:Philippine television series
title: The Half Sisters
